function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of remuneration for CHWs leading to reduced motivation and engagement","Impact":"Decreased delivery of vaccines, health education, and essential interventions to families","Mitigation":"Implement remuneration for CHWs to incentivize continued delivery of high-quality essential interventions","Technologies":"N/A","People":"CHWs, families receiving essential interventions","Owner":"Governments, health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate primary health care system and supplies during COVID-19 crises","Impact":"Inability to provide essential health care services and COVID-19 preparedness communication","Mitigation":"Invest in deploying additional health workers and prioritize essential interventions for families, including vaccinations, antenatal care, and referrals","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Governments, health organizations","Owner":"Governments, health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of educational programs due to closure of formal education systems","Impact":"Disruption of general education and health education delivery","Mitigation":"Mobilize informal institutions such as CHWs and community support groups to deliver health and general education","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Communities, students, CHWs","Owner":"Governments, education organizations"}]}
